item.title: [Python] Interview schedule optimization
item.description: #Problem setting Issues in interview schedule adjustment Employees may be responsible for coordinating the dates of hiring candidates and interviewers. It is assumed that the manager must pay attention to the following points for each employee. ・Understanding the business days and times when sales can ・Reduce the bias in the number of interviews ・Make the sales specialties close to the applicant’s specialties ・Ensure that you will not be in charge of interviews late at night
